hsv_slider.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 """
2 A helper python script to find the appropriate ranges of HSV values for the marker images.
3 The range of HSV values will be later used in the detection algorithms to filter out any
4 colors that is out of the marker.
5 """
6 
7 
8 from __future__ import print_function
9 import cv2 as cv
10 import argparse
11 max_value = 255
12 max_value_H = 360//2
13 low_H = 0
14 low_S = 0
15 low_V = 0
16 high_H = max_value_H
17 high_S = max_value
18 high_V = max_value
19 window_capture_name = 'Video Capture'
20 window_detection_name = 'Object Detection'
21 low_H_name = 'Low H'
22 low_S_name = 'Low S'
23 low_V_name = 'Low V'
24 high_H_name = 'High H'
25 high_S_name = 'High S'
26 high_V_name = 'High V'
27 def on_low_H_thresh_trackbar(val):
28  global low_H
29  global high_H
30  low_H = val
31  low_H = min(high_H-1, low_H)
32  cv.setTrackbarPos(low_H_name, window_detection_name, low_H)
33 def on_high_H_thresh_trackbar(val):
34  global low_H
35  global high_H
36  high_H = val
37  high_H = max(high_H, low_H+1)
38  cv.setTrackbarPos(high_H_name, window_detection_name, high_H)
39 def on_low_S_thresh_trackbar(val):
40  global low_S
41  global high_S
42  low_S = val
43  low_S = min(high_S-1, low_S)
44  cv.setTrackbarPos(low_S_name, window_detection_name, low_S)
45 def on_high_S_thresh_trackbar(val):
46  global low_S
47  global high_S
48  high_S = val
49  high_S = max(high_S, low_S+1)
50  cv.setTrackbarPos(high_S_name, window_detection_name, high_S)
51 def on_low_V_thresh_trackbar(val):
52  global low_V
53  global high_V
54  low_V = val
55  low_V = min(high_V-1, low_V)
56  cv.setTrackbarPos(low_V_name, window_detection_name, low_V)
57 def on_high_V_thresh_trackbar(val):
58  global low_V
59  global high_V
60  high_V = val
61  high_V = max(high_V, low_V+1)
62  cv.setTrackbarPos(high_V_name, window_detection_name, high_V)
63 parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description='Code for Thresholding Operations using inRange tutorial.')
64 parser.add_argument('--camera', help='Camera divide number.', default=0, type=int)
65 args = parser.parse_args()
66 cap = cv.VideoCapture(args.camera)
67 cv.namedWindow(window_capture_name)
68 cv.namedWindow(window_detection_name)
69 cv.createTrackbar(low_H_name, window_detection_name , low_H, max_value_H, on_low_H_thresh_trackbar)
70 cv.createTrackbar(high_H_name, window_detection_name , high_H, max_value_H, on_high_H_thresh_trackbar)
71 cv.createTrackbar(low_S_name, window_detection_name , low_S, max_value, on_low_S_thresh_trackbar)
72 cv.createTrackbar(high_S_name, window_detection_name , high_S, max_value, on_high_S_thresh_trackbar)
73 cv.createTrackbar(low_V_name, window_detection_name , low_V, max_value, on_low_V_thresh_trackbar)
74 cv.createTrackbar(high_V_name, window_detection_name , high_V, max_value, on_high_V_thresh_trackbar)
75 while True:
76 
77  # ret, frame = cap.read()
78  # if frame is None:
79  # break
80  frame = cv.imread("vision/pictures/RepositionedPhotos/marker3.png")
81  frame_HSV = cv.cvtColor(frame, cv.COLOR_BGR2HSV)
82  frame_threshold = cv.inRange(frame_HSV, (low_H, low_S, low_V), (high_H, high_S, high_V))
83 
84 
85  cv.imshow(window_capture_name, frame)
86  cv.imshow(window_detection_name, frame_threshold)
87 
88  key = cv.waitKey(30)
89  if key == ord('q') or key == 27:
90  break
